@dev This function marks the @msg.sender to be an approver and added to the list of approvers.
Note: Approvers can't can't be voters and can't be applicants.*

Note: Voters can't can't be approvers but can be applicants.*

applyForApprover().details: This function marks the @msg.sender to be an approver and added to the list of approvers. Note: Approvers can't can't be voters and can't be applicants.*

applyForVoter().details: This function marks the @msg.sender to be an voter and added to the list of voters. Note: Voters can't can't be approvers but can be applicants.*

approve(uint256).details: This function approves the idea by the randomly selected approver.*

reject(uint256).details: This function rejects the idea by the approver.*

submit(string,string,string,string).details: This function creates a new idea to apply for innovation approval.

params.description: Description or overview of the proposal
params.title: Title of proposal
